verses.verse: So they brought <WH935> <WH8686> the ark <WH727> of 'Elohim <WH430>, and set <WH3322> <WH8686> it in the midst <WH8432> of the tent <WH168> that David <WH1732> had pitched <WH5186> <WH8804> for it: and they offered <WH7126> <WH8686> burnt sacrifices <WH5930> and peace offerings <WH8002> before <WH6440> 'Elohim <WH430>.

And when David <WH1732> had made an end <WH3615> <WH8762> of offering <WH5927> <WH8687> the burnt offerings <WH5930> and the peace offerings <WH8002>, he blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> the people <WH5971> in the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>.

And he dealt <WH2505> <WH8762> to every one <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, both man <WH376> and woman <WH802>, to every one <WH376> a hallah <WH3603> of bread <WH3899>, and a good piece of flesh <WH829>, and a flagon <WH809> of wine.

And he appointed <WH5414> <WH8799> certain of the L'vi'im <WH3881> to minister <WH8334> <WH8764> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>, and to record <WH2142> <WH8687>, and to thank <WH3034> <WH8687> and praise <WH1984> <WH8763> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>:

Asaph <WH623> the chief <WH7218>, and next <WH4932> to him Z'kharyah-yahu <WH2148>, Jeiel <WH3273>, and Shemiramoth <WH8070>, and Jehiel <WH3171>, and Mattithiah <WH4993>, and Eliab <WH446>, and Benaiah <WH1141>, and `Ovededom <WH5654>: and Jeiel <WH3273> with psalteries <WH5035> <WH3627> and with harps <WH3658>; but Asaph <WH623> made a sound <WH8085> <WH8688> with cymbals <WH4700>;
Benaiah <WH1141> also and YAHaziel <WH3166> the Kohanim <WH3548> with shofars <WH2689> continually <WH8548> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of 'Elohim <WH430>.

Then on that day <WH3117> David <WH1732> delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> first <WH7218> this psalm to thank <WH3034> <WH8687> the YY <WH3068> into the hand <WH3027> of Asaph <WH623> and his brethren <WH251>.
Give thanks <WH3034> <WH8685> unto the YY <WH3068>, call <WH7121> <WH8798> upon his name <WH8034>, make known <WH3045> <WH8685> his deeds <WH5949> among the people <WH5971>.
Sing <WH7891> <WH8798> unto him, sing psalms <WH2167> <WH8761> unto him, talk <WH7878> <WH8798> ye of all his wondrous <WH6381> <WH8737> works.
Glory <WH1984> <WH8690> ye in his holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>: let the heart <WH3820> of them rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799> that seek <WH1245> <WH8764> the YY <WH3068>.
Seek <WH1875> <WH8798> the YY <WH3068> and his strength <WH5797>, seek <WH1245> <WH8761> his face <WH6440> continually <WH8548>.
Remember <WH2142> <WH8798> his marvellous <WH6381> <WH8737> works that he hath done <WH6213> <WH8804>, his wonders <WH4159>, and the judgments <WH4941> of his mouth <WH6310>;
O ye seed <WH2233> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> his servant <WH5650>, ye children <WH1121> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, his chosen ones <WH972>.
He is the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>; his judgments <WH4941> are in all the earth <WH776>.
Be ye mindful <WH2142> <WH8798> always <WH5769> of his covenant <WH1285>; the word <WH1697> which he commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> to a thousand <WH505> generations <WH1755>;
Havahn of the covenant which he made <WH3772> <WH8804> with Avraham <WH85>, and of his oath <WH7621> unto Yitz'chak <WH3327>;
And hath confirmed <WH5975> <WH8686> the same to Ya`akov <WH3290> for a Torah <WH2706>, and to Yisra'EL <WH3478> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285>,
Saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Unto thee will I give <WH5414> <WH8799> the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, the lot <WH2256> of your inheritance <WH5159>;
When ye were but few <WH4557> <WH4962>, even a few <WH4592>, and strangers <WH1481> <WH8802> in it.
And when they went <WH1980> <WH8691> from nation <WH1471> to nation <WH1471>, and from one kingdom <WH4467> to another <WH312> people <WH5971>;
He suffered <WH3240> <WH8689> no man <WH376> to do them wrong <WH6231> <WH8800>: yea, he reproved <WH3198> <WH8686> kings <WH4428> for their sakes,
Saying, Touch <WH5060> <WH8799> not mine anointed <WH4899>, and do my prophets <WH5030> no harm <WH7489> <WH8686>.
Sing <WH7891> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068>, all the earth <WH776>; shew forth <WH1319> <WH8761> from day <WH3117> to day <WH3117> his salvation <WH3444>.
Declare <WH5608> <WH8761> his glory <WH3519> among the heathen <WH1471>; his marvellous works <WH6381> <WH8737> among all nations <WH5971>.
For great <WH1419> is the YY <WH3068>, and greatly <WH3966> to be praised <WH1984> <WH8794>: he also is to be feared <WH3372> <WH8737> above all 'elohim <WH430>.
For all the 'elohim <WH430> of the people <WH5971> are idols <WH457>: but the YY <WH3068> made <WH6213> <WH8804> the heavens <WH8064>.
Glory <WH1935> and honour <WH1926> are in his presence <WH6440>; strength <WH5797> and gladness <WH2304> are in his place <WH4725>.
Give <WH3051> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068>, ye kindreds <WH4940> of the people <WH5971>, give <WH3051> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068> glory <WH3519> and strength <WH5797>.

Give <WH3051> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068> the glory <WH3519> due unto his name <WH8034>: bring <WH5375> <WH8798> an offering <WH4503>, and come <WH935> <WH8798> before <WH6440> him: worship <WH7812> <WH8690> the YY <WH3068> in the beauty <WH1927> of holiness <WH6944>.
Fear <WH2342> <WH8798> before <WH6440> him, all the earth <WH776>: the world <WH8398> also shall be stable <WH3559> <WH8735>, that it be not moved <WH4131> <WH8735>.

Let the heavens <WH8064> be glad <WH8055> <WH8799>, and let the earth <WH776> rejoice <WH1523> <WH8799>: and let men say <WH559> <WH8799> among the nations <WH1471>, The YY <WH3068> reigneth <WH4427> <WH8804>.
Let the sea <WH3220> roar <WH7481> <WH8799>, and the fulness <WH4393> thereof: let the fields <WH7704> rejoice <WH5970> <WH8799>, and all that is therein.

Then shall the trees <WH6086> of the wood <WH3293> sing out <WH7442> <WH8762> at the presence <WH6440> of the YY <WH3068>, because he cometh <WH935> <WH8804> to judge <WH8199> <WH8800> the earth <WH776>.
O give thanks <WH3034> <WH8685> unto the YY <WH3068>; for he is good <WH2896>; for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.

And say <WH559> <WH8798> ye, Save <WH3467> <WH8685> us, O 'Elohim <WH430> of our salvation <WH3468>, and gather us together <WH6908> <WH8761>, and deliver <WH5337> <WH8685> us from the heathen <WH1471>, that we may give thanks <WH3034> <WH8687> to thy holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>, and glory <WH7623> <WH8692> in thy praise <WH8416>.

Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5769>. And all the people <WH5971> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Amen <WH543>, and praised <WH1984> <WH8763> the YY <WH3068>.

So he left <WH5800> <WH8799> there before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH3068> Asaph <WH623> and his brethren <WH251>, to minister <WH8334> <WH8763> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> continually <WH8548>, as every day's <WH3117> work <WH1697> required <WH3117>:
And `Ovededom <WH5654> with their brethren <WH251>, threescore <WH8346> and eight <WH8083>; `Ovededom <WH5654> also the son <WH1121> of Jeduthun <WH3038> and Hosah <WH2621> to be porters <WH7778>:

And Zadok <WH6659> the Kohen <WH3548>, and his brethren <WH251> the Kohanim <WH3548>, before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH4908> of the YY <WH3068> in the high place <WH1116> that was at Giv`on <WH1391>,

To offer <WH5927> <WH8687> burnt offerings <WH5930> unto the YY <WH3068> upon the altar <WH4196> of the burnt offering <WH5930> continually <WH8548> morning <WH1242> and evening <WH6153>, and to do according to all that is written <WH3789> <WH8803> in the Torah <WH8451> of the YY <WH3068>, which he commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> Yisra'EL <WH3478>;

And with them Heman <WH1968> and Jeduthun <WH3038>, and the rest <WH7605> that were chosen <WH1305> <WH8803>, who were expressed <WH5344> <WH8738> by name <WH8034>, to give thanks <WH3034> <WH8687> to the YY <WH3068>, because his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>;

And with them Heman <WH1968> and Jeduthun <WH3038> with shofars <WH2689> and cymbals <WH4700> for those that should make a sound <WH8085> <WH8688>, and with musical <WH7892> instruments <WH3627> of 'Elohim <WH430>. And the sons <WH1121> of Jeduthun <WH3038> were porters <WH8179>.
And all the people <WH5971> departed <WH3212> <WH8799> every man <WH376> to his house <WH1004>: and David <WH1732> returned <WH5437> <WH8735> to bless <WH1288> <WH8763> his house <WH1004>.
